original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:33:30' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND u.UpVotes<=47
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:33:30'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 0 AND users.UpVotes <= 47
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E4E3.UserId)
